articles.description: Raul Jimenez should be out of hospital early next week after making good progress in his recovery from a fractured skull, according to Wolves’ club doctor.
articles.content: Dr Matt Perry said the striker, who underwent an operation after a sickening clash of heads with Arsenal defender David Luiz on Sunday, will require space, rest and peace as he continues his recovery… [+2820 chars]

articles.title: Carlos Corberan admits positional tweak backfired in Cardiff City humiliation - Yorkshire Live
articles.description: Jonathan Hogg was deployed in a very deep-lying sweeper role behind the two centre-backs whenever the Terriers had the ball but it ended up creating more problems than it solved
articles.content:
Carlos Corberan acknowledged that a change of position for Jonathan Hogg did not have the intended effect against Cardiff City.
 The Huddersfield Town stalwart has occasionally played at centre-back… [+2416 chars]

articles.title: Jurgen Klopp is 'controlling the narrative' at Liverpool just like Sir Alex, says Rio Ferdinand - Daily Mail

articles.author: Rich Jones
articles.title: Diego Maradona's son asks Lionel Messi to give up No.10 shirt at Barcelona and Argentina - Mirror Online
articles.description: Lionel Messi has followed in the footsteps of Diego Maradona as Barcelona and Argentina's No.10 - but the son of the late superstar wants the number retired at his former teams in his honour
articles.content:
Diego Maradonas son has called on Lionel Messi to give up the No.10 shirt as a tribute to his father after his death.
Maradona died last week aged 60 at his home in Argentina with heartfelt tributes… [+1981 chars]
